attributes.action: A&E patients to pay for alchohol related treatment
attributes.additional_details:
With NHS resources being stretched to breaking point it is about time that those admitted to A&E with injuries etc directly related to their excessive intake of alchohol are compelled to bear the cost of that treatment.

The Government should set out a table of costs and it should be a criminal offence not to pay.  This initiative will also cut down on binge drinking and improve overall health.
